name: You are the Monster (ALB5000)
description:
Try to survive for the longest time.

Controls : arrows, left-mouse click to attack, "g" "p" and "s" to change weapon

There are 5 différents ennemis :

-BeardEnnemi : 3 lifes

-MiniEnnemi : mini

-BigEnnemi : split into 2 mini ennemi when he dies

-MustacheEnnemi : faster

-BasicEnnemi : Nothing special

There are also 2 power-ups:

-Shield : when collected give invincibility for the ennemi who touches you

-Weapon : you can shoot two times faster for 5 seconds

There are finnaly 3 weapons :

-Gun : shoot one bullet at a fast rate

-ShotGun : shoot a lot of bullets at a medium rate

-GrenadeLauncher : shoot one bullet which kill all ennemies on board at a slow rate

Made in one day.
